Bonefish Grill specializes in fish grilled over an oak-burning grill with a variety of sauces and original toppings. Its restaurants offer a variety of appetizers, soups, salads, grilled fish dishes, wines and martinis. The chain s restaurants  menus feature a selection of hand-cut steaks and pork tenderloins, as well as pasta and chicken dishes. Its entr es are accompanied with bread and a choice of rice, seasonal vegetables and potatoes. Bonefish Grill s restaurants additionally serve desserts, such as chocolate macadamia nut brownie cakes and key lime pies.

Dale s Southern Grill is a casual, family-owned restaurant that serves customers through various locations in Alabama. The restaurant provides lunch and dinner options. In addition, Dale s Southern Grill serves homemade desserts, such as pies and puddings. The restaurant provides a range of alcoholic and nonalcoholic beverages that includes milk, ice tea, coffee, wine, beer and soft drinks. It has a private dining room for parties and special occasions. Dale s Southern Grill offers gift cards and recipes, as well as takeout services.

Its dinner menu includes clear soups, house salads, fried rice, mixed vegetables and stir-fried noodles. The restaurant maintains a lounge area that offers light and dark rum, pineapple juice and ice cream. Sumo Japanese Steakhouse and Sushi Bar additionally hosts various parties. It is located in Birmingham, Ala.

In addition, Dale s Southern Grill serves homemade desserts, such as pies and puddings. The restaurant provides a range of alcoholic and nonalcoholic beverages that includes milk, ice tea, coffee, wine, beer and soft drinks. It has a private dining room for parties and special occasions. Dale s Southern Grill offers gift cards and recipes, as well as takeout services.

Sumo Japanese Steakhouse and Sushi Bar is a full-service casual restaurant that offers a variety of dining options to its guests. Its menu includes white tuna, yellow tail, smoked salmon, green mussel, scallops, crab sticks and sushi platters. The restaurant serves tiger, lobster, asahi, Manhattan, California, spider, caterpillar, Tokyo and Alaskan rolls. Sumo Japanese Steakhouse and Sushi Bar also provides vegetable and tofu dinners, teriyaki chicken, hibachi steaks, filet mignon, and teppanyaki scallops and shrimp. Its dinner menu includes clear soups, house salads, fried rice, mixed vegetables and stir-fried noodles. The restaurant maintains a lounge area that offers light and dark rum, pineapple juice and ice cream. Sumo Japanese Steakhouse and Sushi Bar additionally hosts various parties. It is located in Birmingham, Ala.
